overview: The unwritten law of nature - the cycle that gives rise to the grave sins of man. A crime boss has been killed. The city was swept by the war of criminal groups. But neither the police officers nor the leaders of criminal groups know that the beginning of these events is rooted in the distant past. Finding the beginning of this cycle falls on the shoulders of a simple village district lieutenant Fedorov...
title: Суруллубатах сокуон
